mapper.insert: insert into app_log (id, cookie_id, domain, request_url, user_name, request_ip, operation, description, params, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cookieId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
cookie_id,
domain,
request_url,

request_ip,
operation,
description,
params,
create_time,
